notes.body: Hello Vikashini,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655529863954300928-69932.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 05 December 2025,2:16 PM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 06 December 2025.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Vikashini,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655529863954300928-69932.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 05 December 2025,2:16 PM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 06 December 2025.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Manikantan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      Thank you for sharing the images.​     I understand your concern related to the order #655610534060453888-89414. I am sorry to know that you have received the wrong product.  ​   Please be informed that the replacement feature is currently unavailable.     I have highlighted the issue to the Escalation team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them within 4 to 5 working days.     As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 50 to your PharmEasy wallet.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Manikantan,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

Thank you for sharing the images.​

I understand your concern related to the order #655610534060453888-89414. I am sorry to know that you have received the wrong product.
​
Please be informed that the replacement feature is currently unavailable.

I have highlighted the issue to the Escalation team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them within 4 to 5 working days.

As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 50 to your PharmEasy wallet.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Ahana,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   I understand your concern regarding the unavailability of Nystatin Strip of 1 Vaginal Suppository. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     As per our records, this item is currently not in stock for your pin code 560077 on PharmEasy.     If the medicine/item is out of stock on our portal, kindly click on the 'Notify me' button. A notification will be sent to you once the item is in stock with our Partner Retailer.     You may place the order with the required details after you receive the notification. If the medicine/item is available and arranged, we will deliver it to you.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Ahana,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
I understand your concern regarding the unavailability of Nystatin Strip of 1 Vaginal Suppository. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per our records, this item is currently not in stock for your pin code 560077 on PharmEasy.

If the medicine/item is out of stock on our portal, kindly click on the 'Notify me' button. A notification will be sent to you once the item is in stock with our Partner Retailer.

You may place the order with the required details after you receive the notification. If the medicine/item is available and arranged, we will deliver it to you.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body:
My query was specifically about the stock availability whether it will be
available soon and if there’s any timeline. Instead, the reply I received
only told me that I can place an order when the stock is available, which I
obviously already know. If this is something beyond customer care’s
control, you can state that honestly rather than repeating basic
instructions. My issue wasn’t resolved by being told to ‘press the notify
button.’

This isn’t a makeup product. It’s a medicine, needed urgently for a patient
who is suffering. Customer care shouldn’t be giving such a non-chalant &
bot response when it concerns essential medical items.
notes.body_html:
My query was specifically about the stock availability whether it will be available soon and if there’s any timeline. Instead, the reply I received only told me that I can place an order when the stock is available, which I obviously already know. If this is something beyond customer care’s control, you can state that honestly rather than repeating basic instructions. My issue wasn’t resolved by being told to ‘press the notify button.’

This isn’t a makeup product. It’s a medicine, needed urgently for a patient who is suffering. Customer care shouldn’t be giving such a non-chalant & bot response when it concerns essential medical items.

notes.body: Hello Ahmed,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  We understand your concern in regard to order #653077474018066432.       A refund of Rs. 345.70 was initiated to your account on 27.11.2025. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this.   ​   Please note that the refund might not be shown in the UPI account and the same is credited to your bank account. Kindly check your bank account and wait till the above timeframe.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Pharmeasy Customer Care Team (care@pharmeasy.in),

I placed an order for my wife's diabetic medicine this morning, expecting
same-day delivery as promised on your platform. The order was scheduled for
today, December 5, 2025, but it has not been delivered despite multiple
follow-ups.Your app incorrectly shows that I changed the delivery date,
which I did not. I received only one call from a landline number that got
disconnected before I could respond, and callbacks to that number failed.
Later, I obtained the delivery person's mobile number; he claimed to be at
Kestopur but said his bike was out of order, preventing delivery.

My wife is hyperglycemic with sugar levels exceeding 400, requiring this
medicine daily to manage her condition and perform basic chores. Had the
app shown tomorrow's delivery, I would have sourced it locally at a 25%
discount. This lapse in delivering life-saving drugs—not mere apparel—has
left her without medication tonight. Who bears responsibility for any
adverse health outcomes? I request immediate action: arrange emergency

helpdesk_ticket.subject: ORDER ID :- 655823484796485632||Urgent Complaint: Non-Delivery of Critical Diabetic Medicine Ordered Today Morning - Wife's Sugar Levels Critical at 400+
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Pharmeasy Customer Care Team (care@pharmeasy.in),

I placed an order for my wife's diabetic medicine this morning, expecting same-day delivery as promised on your platform. The order was scheduled for today, December 5, 2025, but it has not been delivered despite multiple follow-ups.Your app incorrectly shows that I changed the delivery date, which I did not. I received only one call from a landline number that got disconnected before I could respond, and callbacks to that number failed. Later, I obtained the delivery person's mobile number; he claimed to be at Kestopur but said his bike was out of order, preventing delivery.

My wife is hyperglycemic with sugar levels exceeding 400, requiring this medicine daily to manage her condition and perform basic chores. Had the app shown tomorrow's delivery, I would have sourced it locally at a 25% discount. This lapse in delivering life-saving drugs—not mere apparel—has left her without medication tonight. Who bears responsibility for any adverse health outcomes? I request immediate action: arrange emergency delivery tonight, full refund if undeliverable, and compensation for the distress. Also, urge better training for staff on handling urgent medications to prevent such incidents.Please respond within the hour and confirm resolution. Order details

Regds,
Samit Daw,
9007585388.

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Request for Complete Personal Data Deletion (Right to Erasure)
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello Team,

I am requesting complete deletion of all my personal data from the PharmEasy database.
This includes my name, address, phone number, email ID, saved locations, order history, prescriptions, uploaded documents, and any other personal information linked with my account.

Under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act (DPDP Act) 2023, I am exercising my Right to Erasure and asking for removal of all personal data that is not required for legal or regulatory compliance.

Please proceed with the deletion and confirm once done.
I specifically want full data deletion, not just account deactivation.

Thank you,
Bhoomi

Disclaimer:
This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello Bhoomi,   Greetings from PharmEasy!  With reference to your personal data deletion request, I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities.    However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account or want to stop receiving promotional SMS/Emails so that we can check and do the needful at the earliest.  Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block your account.   Awaiting your response.         Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Bhoomi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With reference to your personal data deletion request, I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to delete the account from our database. As we have to show all transactions or interactions, past or present when asked for by relevant Government authorities. 
 
However, kindly confirm with us if you wish to deactivate the account or want to stop receiving promotional SMS/Emails so that we can check and do the needful at the earliest.

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block your account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Bhoomi,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  We tried calling you on the contact number 6355909810; however, we were unable to connect with you.     As confirmed by our Level 1 customer care, currently, we do not have a provision to delete the account from our database. We can deactivate your account; however, we will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently. Please confirm if you wish to go ahead with the reason for the deactivation of your account 6355909810. Upon your confirmation, we will arrange a call from our Escalations team. An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number, and we will require the OTP to deactivate your account. Please be assured that once deactivated, no other party can access your account.   Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Bhoomi,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We tried calling you on the contact number 6355909810; however, we were unable to connect with you.

As confirmed by our Level 1 customer care, currently, we do not have a provision to delete the account from our database. We can deactivate your account; however, we will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently. Please confirm if you wish to go ahead with the reason for the deactivation of your account 6355909810. Upon your confirmation, we will arrange a call from our Escalations team. An OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number, and we will require the OTP to deactivate your account. Please be assured that once deactivated, no other party can access your account.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

notes.body: Hello Amitesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern regarding order #655111377897041920-38043. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     Please note that we are unable to view the images shared from your end. However, we can proceed with raising a return request for the product.        Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.   ​  You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.  ​  Click on the link to set the refund preference:  https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.  ​  Awaiting your response.  ​  Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Amitesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern regarding order #655111377897041920-38043. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

Please note that we are unable to view the images shared from your end. However, we can proceed with raising a return request for the product.

Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. 
​
You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.
​
Click on the link to set the refund preference:
https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds
 
Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.
​
Awaiting your response.
​
Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!        I tried to reach you earlier today at 10:25 AM on ​9323802066, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.  ​   I understand your concern regarding the order #655940270069108736-34061. I will surely assist you with this.  ​   As per our records, your order was cancelled on 06th December 2025 at 03:52 AM.  ​   ​The refund amount of Rs. 167.59 was initiated on 05th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​570508136637).  ​   ​The refund amount of Rs. 1996.95 was initiated on 06th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​534001646004).  ​   Additionally, I see the ROSYCAP 10MG (Strip of 15 Tablets) was substituted with CARDIOROSTIN 10MG (Strip of 10 Tablets) at the time of order confirmation.  ​   Kindly confirm whether this substitution was made with your consent so that we can take further action.  ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Manisha

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I tried to reach you earlier today at 10:25 AM on ​9323802066, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.
​
I understand your concern regarding the order #655940270069108736-34061. I will surely assist you with this.
​
As per our records, your order was cancelled on 06th December 2025 at 03:52 AM.
​
​The refund amount of Rs. 167.59 was initiated on 05th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​570508136637).
​
​The refund amount of Rs. 1996.95 was initiated on 06th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (​534001646004).

Additionally, I see the ROSYCAP 10MG (Strip of 15 Tablets) was substituted with CARDIOROSTIN 10MG (Strip of 10 Tablets) at the time of order confirmation.

Kindly confirm whether this substitution was made with your consent so that we can take further action.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Waqar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is with regards to your order # 655940270069108736-34061, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.  We tried to call you regarding the concern raised however we are unable to establish contact with you.  As per the update received from our team, please be informed that the substitute medicine was added by the agent after confirmation with you on the delivery contact number. Hence, there was no error from the agent. We have shared the required feedback to avoid calling for any substitute or upsell of the product so that it will not happen again. As checked, you have cancelled this order and placed a new order, which has been delivered to you.  If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Waqar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order # 655940270069108736-34061, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We tried to call you regarding the concern raised however we are unable to establish contact with you.

As per the update received from our team, please be informed that the substitute medicine was added by the agent after confirmation with you on the delivery contact number. Hence, there was no error from the agent. We have shared the required feedback to avoid calling for any substitute or upsell of the product so that it will not happen again. As checked, you have cancelled this order and placed a new order, which has been delivered to you.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand you wish to return the medicine from your order #655088767431782400-67767. I am sorry to know that you have received the wrong medicine. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     Please note that if we raise a return request for the CRETOX CP STRIP OF 10 TABLETS of 5 quantities, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern regarding the mail.     I would like to inform you we only export in pan India. We regret the disappointment caused to you. Please note that, in the future, if we expand our serviceability, you will be notified accordingly.     You may place a new order from the PharmEasy application or website- www.pharmeasy.in or you may call us at  999 29 999 29 and Press 1 to place an order. If the medicine is available, it will be delivered to you. Please note that the orders can only be placed from an Indian-registered mobile number.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Ganapathy,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   ​With regards to your order #655763613631856640-41273, I see your order is dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 07th December 2025.  Please note that the estimated date of delivery for courier orders will vary based on the delivery location. Your order will be delivered within the estimated delivery date committed at the time of order placement. Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.  ​   ​You may also track your order from here https://www.shiprocket.in/shipment-tracking/ with the AWB number ​35899336203472.      Please note that we are unable to deliver partial orders.   ​   As per our records, ​RAZEL 10MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS was substituted with ​ROSUVASTIN 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS and EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) ASHWAGANDHA-IMMUNITY BOOSTER CAPSULES-ANXIETY & STRESS RELIEF - BOTTLE OF 90 was added at the time of order confirmation.  ​   However we can take the return request for ​ROSUVASTIN 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS and EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) ASHWAGANDHA-IMMUNITY BOOSTER CAPSULES-ANXIETY & STRESS RELIEF - BOTTLE OF 90 once the order is delivered.     I request you to get back once the order is delivered for further action.     Kindly confirm whether this substitution and adding was made with your consent so that we can proceed further.     Awaiting your response.     Regards, Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Ganapathy,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
​With regards to your order #655763613631856640-41273, I see your order is dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 07th December 2025.

Please note that the estimated date of delivery for courier orders will vary based on the delivery location. Your order will be delivered within the estimated delivery date committed at the time of order placement. Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.
​
​You may also track your order from here https://www.shiprocket.in/shipment-tracking/ with the AWB number ​35899336203472. 

Please note that we are unable to deliver partial orders.
​
As per our records, ​RAZEL 10MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS was substituted with ​ROSUVASTIN 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS and EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) ASHWAGANDHA-IMMUNITY BOOSTER CAPSULES-ANXIETY & STRESS RELIEF - BOTTLE OF 90 was added at the time of order confirmation.
​
However we can take the return request for ​ROSUVASTIN 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS and EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) ASHWAGANDHA-IMMUNITY BOOSTER CAPSULES-ANXIETY & STRESS RELIEF - BOTTLE OF 90 once the order is delivered.

I request you to get back once the order is delivered for further action.

Kindly confirm whether this substitution and adding was made with your consent so that we can proceed further.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Ashraff,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  We are extremely sorry that the item COLLAFLEX FOR JOINT HEALTH | SACHET | 10.2 GM was cancelled due to unavailability. Please note that we show the "out of stock" tab only when the item cannot be arranged through us.      The item COLLAFLEX FOR JOINT HEALTH | SACHET | 10.2 GM was not in stock with our partner retailer. Our partner retailer tried to arrange it with other distributors; however, it was not successful. We assure you that this shortfall in your order would have occurred only if the partner retailer had exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable item.      There is a possibility that the required item was in stock at the time of placing the order. However, due to the high inflow of orders, the partner retailer has exhausted the stock of this particular item. Please note that the reason for this shortfall is the generic unavailability of this particular item with our partner retailer or other retailers in the vicinity.      We have highlighted with our partner retailer to check its further availability. We will notify you once we get a further update. Please do not place a new order for this item until we update you. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.    Regards, PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello K K Jindal,    Greetings from PharmEasy!   With regards to your order #642433007363366912-41505, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 8th December, 2025.   As the medicine has been returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days post verification. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your pe wallet (refund cash) within 24-48 hrs.We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!   Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello K K Jindal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #642433007363366912-41505, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 8th December, 2025.

As the medicine has been returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days post verification. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your pe wallet (refund cash) within 24-48 hrs.We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ninad,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #654410443525718016-56369, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine GEN D3 60K STRIP OF 8 SOFTGEL CAPSULES of 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 3-5 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #655403587638894592, I can see the requested medicine, PILORUTE TUBE OF 30GM CREAM was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure all the rest of the medicines are delivered to you.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. I am sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with our platform. It was never our intention to upset you by any means.     Also, I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.  ​   I understand that you wish to modify the medicine. Please be informed that we are unable to modify the order once the order is placed. I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.       Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #655403587638894592, I can see the requested medicine, PILORUTE TUBE OF 30GM CREAM was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure all the rest of the medicines are delivered to you.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. I am sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with our platform. It was never our intention to upset you by any means.

Also, I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.
​
I understand that you wish to modify the medicine. Please be informed that we are unable to modify the order once the order is placed. I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

 Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Dipak,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #653960400596377600-46025.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been cancelled on 08th December 2025 as multiple call attempt for informing to self collect your order has been finishaed. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery partner and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.
